VBox.Label: "No, SERIOUSLY, did you read the instructions?"
"If you page or ask about things explicitly stated"
"in the instructions, we will not be happy."
"We may even kick you from the event."
"We are tired of people complaining about things or"
"constantly paging about things that are clearly explained."
"(If something is unclear, incorrect, or wrong, let us know, of course)"

HBox.Label: "Yes I carefully read the instructions. Let me join!"
"No, please give me the instructions again."
